DOC.brief_summary: Our overall objective is to understand the role of lifestyle factors, genetics and HPV infection in the development and prognosis of head and neck cancer particularly in Asia.
DOC.brief_title: International Cancer of the Head and Neck, Genetics and Environment (InterCHANGE) Study
DOC.criteria: Age 18~80 Incident head and neck cancer patients Oral, oropharynx and hypopharynx (C00C14) Laryngreal cancer (C32) *Esophageal cancer if possible (C15) Salivary gland (C07C08) Nasopharynx (C11) Thyroid (C79.3)
